requirements.question: Watch an anime that began airing before 2000
Watch an anime that began airing between 2000 and 2005
Watch an anime that began airing between 2006 and 2010
Watch an anime which began airing between 2011 and 2018
Watch an anime with 24 or more episodes
Watch an anime with a title beginning with a letter A-L
Watch an anime with a title beginning with a letter M-Z
Watch an anime with a color in the title
Watch an anime with a three word title
Watch an anime by animation studio Madhouse
Watch an anime by animation studio Bones
Watch an anime by animation studio Shaft
Watch an anime by animation studio Kyoto Animation
Watch an anime from an animation studio not listed above
Watch an anime with a main character with multicoloured hair
Watch an anime where the main character wears a uniform
Watch an anime where the main character is not Japanese
Watch an anime where the main character is not human
Watch an anime with the genre "Drama" AND / OR "Romance"
Watch an anime with the genre "Action" AND / OR "Psychological"
Watch an anime with the genre "Slice of Life" AND / OR "Sports"
Watch an anime with the genre "Mecha" AND / OR "Ecchi"
Watch an anime with the tag: "Yakuza" AND / OR "Mafia" AND / OR "Gangs"
Watch an anime with the tag "Parody" AND / OR "Satire"
Watch an anime with the tag "Josei" OR "Seinen"
Watch an anime with the tag "Shoujo" OR "Shounen"
Watch an anime with the format “Special”
Watch an anime with the format “OVA” or “ONA”
Watch an anime with the format “Movie”
Watch an anime with the format “TV Short” or “Music”
Watch an anime with a mean score between 60% and 69%
Watch an anime with a mean score between 70% and 79%
Watch an anime with a mean score of 80% or above
Watch an anime with the source “Manga”
Watch an anime with the source “Visual Novel” or “Video Game”
Watch an anime with the source “Light Novel”
Watch an anime with the source “Original”
Watch an anime from your Planning list
Watch an anime from an AniList Mod's favorites list
Watch an anime based on another user's profile. Use the anime in their profile picture or banner. If you don't know what anime it's from, ask them
